title: AG2R-Citroën to Become Decathlon-AG2R La Mondiale in 2024, Ride Van Rysel Bikes
content:
The French team unveiled a new-look kit to go with its new name, confirmed it will ride Van Rysel's RCR and XCR bikes in 2024. Sam Bennett, Victor Lafay, and more confirmed on roster.

Read the full article at AG2R-Citroën to Become Decathlon-AG2R La Mondiale in 2024, Ride Van Rysel Bikes on Velo.
author: sadhbhoshea
